City News
---------

![](https://files.municipalone.com/assets/coverimage-371112020241327090.jpg)

### [Solid Waste Services Update:](https://www.cityoftroy.us/news/3605/solid-waste-services-update)

Frontier Waste will be in Troy tomorrow (Jan. 28th) collecting trash and bulk.

![](https://files.municipalone.com/assets/coverimage-490072420241912200.jpg)

### [Due to hazardous driving conditions, City Hall will be closed tomorrow (Tuesday, Jan. 27th).](https://www.cityoftroy.us/news/3604/due-to-hazardous-driving-conditions-city-hall-will-be-closed-tomorrow-tuesday-jan-27th)

City Staff will be available to respond if the need arises.

![](https://files.municipalone.com/assets/coverimage-490072420241912200.jpg)

### [Due to inclement weather, City Hall will be closed tomorrow (Monday, Jan. 26th).](https://www.cityoftroy.us/news/3603/due-to-inclement-weather-city-hall-will-be-closed-tomorrow-monday-jan-26th)

City Staff will be available to respond if the need arises.

![](https://files.municipalone.com/cover-images/icytree80.jpg)

### [Roadway Condition Update:](https://www.cityoftroy.us/news/3602/roadway-condition-update)

City roads have begun to accumulate ice and are becoming unsafe for travel.

[View More News](https://www.cityoftroy.us/news)
